entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to freezing rain this morning then changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
